 17 /**
 18  * @class A VR tile cache backed by a {@link bigshot.ImageTileCache}.
 19  * @augments bigshot.VRTileCache
 20  */
 21 bigshot.ImageVRTileCache = function (onloaded, onCacheInit, parameters) {
 22     this.imageTileCache = new bigshot.ImageTileCache (onloaded, onCacheInit, parameters);
 23     
 24     // Keep the imageTileCache from wrapping around.
 25     this.imageTileCache.setMaxTiles (999999, 999999);
 26 }
 27 
 28 bigshot.ImageVRTileCache.prototype = {
 29     getTexture : function (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel) {
 30         var res = this.imageTileCache.getImage (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel);
 31         return res;
 32     },
 33     
 34     purge : function () {
 35         this.imageTileCache.resetUsed ();
 36     },
 37     
 38     dispose : function () {
 39         
 40     }
 41 }
 42 
 43 bigshot.Object.validate ("bigshot.ImageVRTileCache", bigshot.VRTileCache);
 44
